Posts.Content: Hello I'm new here I'm just wanting some advice my nan was diagnosed 5 years ago with secondary breast cancer which has since spread to her bones. She started chemo weekly taxol I think it was called, but could only have two treatments before she was hospitalized. She has been told now by her specialist that it is not in her interest to continue with chemo. Can anyone offer any advice on what we can expect now ? Time frame etc xx
Posts.Title: My nans treatment
